targets.rawSql: select username as "User Name" from global_users u where userid= $USERID;

select 

global_users.login as "Email"
from global_users
where global_users.userid= $USERID
limit 1;

select date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(global_users.join_date), "%M %d %Y") as "Join Date"
from global_users
where global_users.userid= $USERID
limit 1;
select reputation as "Reputation" from users  where userid= $USERID;

Select count(*)
FROM work_log

INNER JOIN global_users on work_log.userid=global_users.userid 


 INNER JOIN (
    SELECT gtr_revisionid, guideid, MAX(guide_revisionid) AS maxrevision FROM guide_revisions GROUP BY guideid
  ) maxrev ON maxrev.guideid = work_log.guideid 

JOIN guide_revisions ON guide_revisions.guide_revisionid = maxrev.maxrevision

JOIN guide_meta ON guide_revisions.gtr_revisionid = guide_meta.revisionid
JOIN guide_text ON guide_text.gt_revisionid = guide_revisions.gt_revisionid

WHERE work_log.userid = $USERID

SELECT guide_text.title AS metric,
user_success.date as time_sec,
count(user_success.guideid) AS value

FROM user_success

INNER JOIN global_users on user_success.userid=global_users.userid  
-- INNER JOIN guide_current ON user_success.guideid = guide_current.guideid


-- JOIN guide_revisions ON guide_revisions.guideid = user_success.guideid


 INNER JOIN (
    SELECT gtr_revisionid, guideid, MAX(guide_revisionid) AS maxrevision FROM guide_revisions GROUP BY guideid
  ) maxrev ON maxrev.guideid = user_success.guideid 
  
  -- AND maxrev.guide_revisionid = maxrevision
JOIN guide_revisions ON guide_revisions.guide_revisionid = maxrev.maxrevision

JOIN guide_meta ON guide_revisions.gtr_revisionid = guide_meta.revisionid
JOIN guide_text ON guide_text.gt_revisionid = guide_revisions.gt_revisionid

WHERE user_success.userid = $USERID
AND user_success.date >1

GROUP BY user_success.guideid
LIMIT 20 ;

SELECT guide_meta.device AS metric, 
work_log.starttime AS time_sec,
count(work_log.workorderid) as value

FROM work_log

INNER JOIN global_users on work_log.userid=global_users.userid  
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT gtr_revisionid, guideid, MAX(guide_revisionid) AS maxrevision FROM guide_revisions GROUP BY guideid
  ) maxrev ON maxrev.guideid = work_log.guideid 

JOIN guide_revisions ON guide_revisions.guide_revisionid = maxrev.maxrevision


JOIN guide_meta ON guide_revisions.gtr_revisionid = guide_meta.revisionid
JOIN guide_text ON guide_text.gt_revisionid = guide_revisions.gt_revisionid


-- JOIN guide_meta ON work_log.guideid = guide_meta.guideid

WHERE work_log.userid = $USERID
AND work_log.cancelled<>1
and work_log.starttime>0
GROUP BY guide_meta.device
order by count(work_log.workorderid) desc, guide_meta.device
;

SELECT guide_text.title AS metric,
work_log.endtime AS time_sec,
count(work_log.workorderid) AS value
FROM work_log

INNER JOIN global_users on work_log.userid=global_users.userid  


INNER JOIN (SELECT gtr_revisionid, guideid, MAX(guide_revisionid) AS maxrevision FROM guide_revisions GROUP BY guideid) maxrev ON maxrev.guideid = work_log.guideid 

JOIN guide_revisions ON guide_revisions.guide_revisionid = maxrev.maxrevision



JOIN guide_meta ON guide_revisions.gtr_revisionid = guide_meta.revisionid
JOIN guide_text ON guide_text.gt_revisionid = guide_revisions.gt_revisionid




WHERE work_log.userid = $USERID
AND work_log.endtime >1
GROUP BY work_log.guideid
order by count(work_log.workorderid) desc
limit 7
;

SELECT work_log.endtime AS time_sec,
-- work_log.userid as metric,
"Completed Work Orders" as metric,
count(work_log.entryid) as value
FROM work_log

INNER JOIN global_users on work_log.userid = global_users.userid
where work_log.endtime >= global_users.join_date

and work_log.userid= $USERID
-- and work_log.endtime >0
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(work_log.endtime),'%y-%m')
;

SELECT user_view_history.date AS time_sec,
"Guide Views" as metric,
count(user_view_history.historyid) as value
FROM user_view_history


INNER JOIN global_users on user_view_history.userid = global_users.userid
where user_view_history.date >= global_users.join_date


and user_view_history.userid= $USERID
and user_view_history.doc_type= 'GUIDE'
-- and user_view_history.date >0
group by date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_view_history.date),'%y-%m')
order by time_sec
;

SELECT user_view_history.date AS time_sec,
"Wiki Views" as metric,
count(user_view_history.historyid) as value
FROM user_view_history

-- where from_unixtime(user_view_history.date, '%Y-%m-%d') > curdate() - INTERVAL 2 year

INNER JOIN global_users on user_view_history.userid = global_users.userid
where user_view_history.date >= global_users.join_date


and user_view_history.userid= $USERID
and user_view_history.doc_type= 'WIKI'

GROUP BY date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_view_history.date),'%y-%m');

SELECT guide_text.title AS metric,   
work_log.starttime as time_sec,      
count(work_log.workorderid) AS value

FROM work_log

INNER JOIN global_users on work_log.userid=global_users.userid 

INNER JOIN (
    SELECT gtr_revisionid, guideid, MAX(guide_revisionid) AS maxrevision FROM guide_revisions GROUP BY guideid
  ) maxrev ON maxrev.guideid = work_log.guideid 

JOIN guide_revisions ON guide_revisions.guide_revisionid = maxrev.maxrevision



JOIN guide_meta ON guide_revisions.gtr_revisionid = guide_meta.revisionid
JOIN guide_text ON guide_text.gt_revisionid = guide_revisions.gt_revisionid

WHERE work_log.userid = $USERID
and work_log.starttime >0

GROUP BY guide_text.guideid
order by count(work_log.workorderid) desc
LIMIT 7;

SELECT guide_text.title AS metric,
user_view_history.date as time_sec,
-- guide_text.guideid,
count(user_view_history.historyid) AS value

FROM user_view_history

-- INNER JOIN global_users on user_view_history.userid=global_users.userid  

-- INNER JOIN guide_current ON user_view_history.docid = guide_current.guideid

-- JOIN guide_revisions ON guide_revisions.guide_revisionid = guide_current.guide_revisionid


INNER JOIN (
    SELECT gtr_revisionid, guideid, MAX(guide_revisionid) AS maxrevision3 FROM guide_revisions GROUP BY guideid
  ) maxrev3 ON maxrev3.guideid = user_view_history.docid 
  
INNER JOIN guide_revisions ON guide_revisions.guide_revisionid = maxrev3.maxrevision3


JOIN guide_meta ON guide_revisions.gtr_revisionid = guide_meta.revisionid
JOIN guide_text ON guide_text.gt_revisionid = guide_revisions.gt_revisionid

-- JOIN guide_meta ON work_log.guideid = guide_meta.guideid

WHERE user_view_history.userid = $USERID
and user_view_history.doc_type= "GUIDE"
GROUP BY guide_text.guideid
order by count(user_view_history.historyid) desc
LIMIT 7;

panels.content:
Popular Content

The most accessed content created by this user.

panels.description: Most viewed guide created by this user.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 

concat(guide_text.title,CONVERT(X'C2A0' USING utf8), "  (", "Guide ID  ", guide_authors.guideid,"):   ",CONVERT(X'C2A0' USING utf8),CONVERT(X'C2A0' USING utf8),CONVERT(X'C2A0' USING utf8),CONVERT(X'C2A0' USING utf8), count(user_view_history.historyid),  " Views") as "Guide"


FROM user_view_history

-- INNER JOIN global_users on work_log.userid=global_users.userid  


INNER JOIN (
    SELECT gtr_revisionid, guideid, MAX(guide_revisionid) AS auth_max_revision FROM guide_revisions GROUP BY guideid
  ) auth_maxrev ON auth_maxrev.guideid = user_view_history.docid 

JOIN guide_revisions ON guide_revisions.guide_revisionid = auth_maxrev.auth_max_revision

JOIN guide_meta ON guide_revisions.gtr_revisionid = guide_meta.revisionid
JOIN guide_text ON guide_text.gt_revisionid = guide_revisions.gt_revisionid


INNER JOIN (
    SELECT percent as auth_percent, last_contribution, guideid, userid AS authorid FROM guide_authors GROUP BY guideid
  ) guideauthors ON guideauthors.guideid = user_view_history.docid 

join guide_authors on guide_authors.guideid = guideauthors.guideid

-- JOIN guide_meta ON work_log.guideid = guide_meta.guideid
Where user_view_history.doc_type = 'Guide'
and guide_authors.userid = $USERID
and guide_authors.percent >= 10

-- GROUP BY guide_text.title
GROUP BY guide_authors.guideid

order by count(user_view_history.historyid) desc

limit 1;

panels.description: Most viewed question from this user.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT -- postid AS `PostID`, --

concat(title,": ",space(10),CONVERT(X'C2A0' USING utf8),CONVERT(X'C2A0' USING utf8),value,"  Views") as Post
       -- device AS `Device`, --
       -- value AS `Views` --
	   -- userid as 'User' --
	FROM stats_per_month stm
	JOIN posts p ON (stm.id = p.postid)
	WHERE stm.metric = 'hits' AND
	userid= $USERID AND
		  stm.type = 'post'
	ORDER BY value 	
	DESC LIMIT 1;

panels.description: The most accessed guides written by this user.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
-- concat(guide_text.title, "  (", "Guide ID: ", guide_authors.guideid, ")") as "name",
guide_text.title as metric,
user_view_history.date AS time_sec,
-- guide_authors.percent as "Percentage",  
count(user_view_history.historyid) AS value

FROM user_view_history

-- INNER JOIN global_users on work_log.userid=global_users.userid  


INNER JOIN (
    SELECT gtr_revisionid, guideid, MAX(guide_revisionid) AS auth_max_revision FROM guide_revisions GROUP BY guideid
  ) auth_maxrev ON auth_maxrev.guideid = user_view_history.docid 

JOIN guide_revisions ON guide_revisions.guide_revisionid = auth_maxrev.auth_max_revision

JOIN guide_meta ON guide_revisions.gtr_revisionid = guide_meta.revisionid
JOIN guide_text ON guide_text.gt_revisionid = guide_revisions.gt_revisionid


INNER JOIN (
    SELECT percent as auth_percent, last_contribution, guideid, userid AS authorid FROM guide_authors GROUP BY guideid
  ) guideauthors ON guideauthors.guideid = user_view_history.docid 

join guide_authors on guide_authors.guideid = guideauthors.guideid

-- JOIN guide_meta ON work_log.guideid = guide_meta.guideid
Where user_view_history.doc_type = 'Guide'
and guide_authors.userid = $USERID
and guide_authors.percent >= 10

-- GROUP BY guide_text.title
GROUP BY guide_authors.guideid

order by count(user_view_history.historyid) desc

limit 7;

panels.description: Completed work orders for guides authored by this user.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
-- concat(guide_text.title, "  (", "Guide ID: ", guide_authors.guideid, ")") as "Guide",
guide_text.title as metric,
work_log.starttime as time_sec,
-- guide_authors.percent as "Percentage",  
count(work_log.entryid) AS value

FROM work_log

-- INNER JOIN global_users on work_log.userid=global_users.userid  

INNER JOIN 
(SELECT gtr_revisionid, guideid, MAX(guide_revisionid) AS maxrevision FROM guide_revisions GROUP BY guideid) 
maxrev ON maxrev.guideid = work_log.guideid 

JOIN guide_revisions ON guide_revisions.guide_revisionid = maxrev.maxrevision
JOIN guide_meta ON guide_revisions.gtr_revisionid = guide_meta.revisionid
JOIN guide_text ON guide_text.gt_revisionid = guide_revisions.gt_revisionid


INNER JOIN (
    SELECT percent as auth_percent, last_contribution, guideid, userid AS authorid FROM guide_authors GROUP BY guideid
  ) guideauthors ON guideauthors.guideid = work_log.guideid 

join guide_authors on guide_authors.guideid = guideauthors.guideid

-- JOIN guide_meta ON work_log.guideid = guide_meta.guideid

Where guide_authors.userid = $USERID
and work_log.cancelled <> 1
and guide_authors.percent >= 5

-- GROUP BY guide_text.title
GROUP BY guide_authors.guideid

order by count(work_log.entryid) desc

limit 7;

panels.content:
Contribution History

An overview of content created by this author.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT guide_authors.last_contribution AS time_sec,
"Recent Contributions" as metric,
count(guide_authors.guideid) as value
FROM guide_authors


-- SELECT guideid as "Guide ID", percent as "Percentage"
-- from {GUIDE_DB.RAW}.guide_authors 
where userid= $USERID

GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(guide_authors.last_contribution),'%Y-%m')
;

SELECT releases.release_date AS time_sec,
"Guide Releases" as metric,
count(releases.releaseid) as value

FROM releases

INNER JOIN global_users on releases.userid = global_users.userid
where releases.doctype='GUIDE'
and releases.release_date >= global_users.join_date
and releases.userid= $USERID

GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(releases.release_date),'%y-%m-%d');

SELECT guide_meta.date AS time_sec,
"Guide Edits" as metric,
count(guide_meta.revisionid) as value
FROM guide_meta

INNER JOIN global_users on guide_meta.userid = global_users.userid
where guide_meta.date >= global_users.join_date

and guide_meta.userid= $USERID


GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(guide_meta.date),'%y-%m-%d')

;

SELECT guide_authors.last_contribution AS time_sec,
"Authorship" as metric,
count(guide_authors.guideid) as value
FROM guide_authors

INNER JOIN global_users on guide_authors.userid = global_users.userid
where guide_authors.last_contribution >= global_users.join_date
and guide_authors.percent >= 10

and guide_authors.userid= $USERID

GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(guide_authors.last_contribution),'%y-%m-%d');

SELECT guide_meta.date AS time_sec,
"Recent Edits" as metric,
count(guide_meta.revisionid) as value
FROM guide_meta

INNER JOIN global_users on guide_meta.userid = global_users.userid
where guide_meta.date >= global_users.join_date

and guide_meta.userid= $USERID

-- GROUP BY guide_meta.date
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(guide_meta.date),'%y-%m-%d');

SELECT user_history.date AS time_sec,
"Reputation" as metric,
Sum(
user_history.rewarded
	   ) as value
FROM user_history


INNER JOIN global_users on user_history.userid = global_users.userid

where from_unixtime(user_history.date) > from_unixtime(global_users.join_date)

and user_history.userid= $USERID
and user_history.rewarded >= 0
GROUP BY 
DATE(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date))
-- YEARWEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date))
;

SELECT user_history.date AS time_sec,
"Total Reputation" as metric,
	   
	   
	      -- (@runtot := @runtot + user_history.rewarded) AS "Total Reputation"
(SELECT SUM(h.rewarded)
FROM user_history as h
WHERE h.userid = user_history.userid
AND DATE(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date)) >= DATE(FROM_UNIXTIME(h.date)) 
)
AS value
	   
FROM user_history
INNER JOIN global_users on user_history.userid = global_users.userid
where user_history.date >= global_users.join_date
and user_history.userid= $USERID
and user_history.rewarded > 0
GROUP BY DATE(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date))
-- GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date),'%y-%m-d%')
-- GROUP BY YEARWEEK(FROM_UNIXTIME(user_history.date))
;

list.label: User
list.name: USERID
list.query: select  CONCAT(global_users.username, " — ", "User ID:", global_users.userid) AS __text, global_users.userid AS __value from global_users
